bug.author: arnaudmiribel
bug.summary: Can't copy/paste when `st.code()` is within an expander.
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
Can't see the Copy to clipboard trigger aside the usual code widget whenever that code widget is within a st.beta_expander(). <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7164864/100725052-d62f5e80-33c3-11eb-852b-2acd1dc4dcb0.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Sufficient code: import streamlit as st
st.code("Code not within an expander. Can be copy/pasted.")
with st.beta_expander("Sample expander"): st.code("Code within an expander. Can't be copy/pasted.") <denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
I'd expect both to have the "Copy to clipboard" icon. <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
Only the first code block has it. <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: Streamlit, version 0.71.0 Python version: Python 3.6.10 Using Conda OS version: 10.14.6 Browser version: Version 87.0.4280.67
